Phase III Study Validates Taphalgin‘s Efficacy for Cancer Pain Management

Phase III Study Validates Taphalgin‘s Efficacy for Cancer Pain Management

19.05.2022
19.05.2022

Our commitment to pain relief has never been stronger. Today, we celebrate the successful completion of Phase III open-label comparative multicentre randomized trial of Taphalgin for cancer pain management. The results further reinforce our belief in Taphalgin's promise and potential in the pharmaceutical market.


Share

About

PVP Labs Pte. Ltd. is a Singapore based biotechnology company that specializes in the development of innovative drugs. Our company was founded in January of 2016. Our research resulted in the development of Taphalgin, which is a replacement for Morphine, and can supplant Fentanyl and Oxycontin, Percocet, etc. Taphalgin is non-addictive, and does not exhibit any of the side effects associated with Morphine or Opioids.
